Please be ready to quote your order number and order date., 166166=You can email us customerservices@johnlewis.com , or call our dedicated international team, 7 days a week, 7am to midnight (UK time) on +44 1698 54 54 54.}
textBeforeTable: John Lewis & Waitrose shops Place and pay for your order online by 8pm today (2pm for Collect+ locations), and we’ll deliver it to your chosen shop for you to collect after 2pm tomorrow (Collect+ times may vary - we'll send you a text as soon as your order's ready to collect). You'll be offered the nearest options for collection in checkout, based on your delivery postcode. How to click & collect
textAfterTable: Standard UK home delivery Orders of £50 and over - FREE (under £50, £3.50 charge) We deliver most items within 3-5 working days, larger items 7 days Direct delivery by our approved suppliers You’ll see the delivery options for a product on each individual product page. If next working day or named day delivery is available for your order, we'll offer you these options at checkout - see Faster and timed deliveries below. Smaller items Usually delivered within 3-5 days Monday to Saturday, 7.30am-6pm (Hampers Monday to Friday Some carriers may deliver slightly earlier or later Orders with several items We may send products out from multiple locations, but if they arrive separately you won't incur additional delivery charges as a result If you order items with both 5 and 7 day quoted despatch times, we may consolidate your order so products arrive together, usually within 7 working days Larger items such as furniture and appliances, delivered by John Lewis green van The delivery window is 7am- 9pm,
